globals.title: Angular
globals.description: Angular is a development platform for building mobile and desktop web applications
globals.keywords: Angular, AngularJS, AngularDart, Javscript, Dart, Framework, JavaScript MVC, Google

raul.name: Raúl Jiménez

talk.title: Angular Talk title
talk.description: My talk will be awesome because of yes

raul.bio: Miško Hevery is the creator of AngularJS framework. He has passion for making complex things simple. He currently works at Google, but has previously worked at Adobe, Sun Microsystems, Intel, and Xerox, where he became an expert in building web applications in web related technologies such as Java, JavaScript, Flex and ActionScript.

sergi.name: Sergi Gimeno

talk.title: Typescript for AngularJS developers
talk.description: An overview on the upcoming release of AngularJS written in Typescript 1.5, a superset of ES6 language.

sergi.bio: Igor is a software engineer at Google. He is a lead on the Angular project, practitioner of test driven development, open source enthusiast, hacker. In his free time, Igor enjoys spending time with his wife and two kids, doing outdoor activities (including but not limited to sports, gardening and building retaining walls).
